doc:
Trinidad Silva https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trinidad_Silva 0 Trinidad Silva, Jr. (January 30, 1950 – July 31, 1988) was an American comedian and character actor, who played small supporting roles in a number of films of the 1980s. He is best known for the roles of Jesus Martinez, a gang leader in the TV series Hill Street Blues; Frog in the film Colors; and Raul, the bizarre animal lover in "Weird" Al Yankovic's first film, UHF. Trinidad_Silva , Jr. ( January_30_,_1950 – July_31_,_1988 ) was an_American_comedian_and_character_actor , who played small_supporting_roles in a_number of films of the_1980s .
